title: More than 130 countries don't have a single Covid-19 vaccine, while 10 countries have already dispersed 75% of all vaccines, the UN says
content:
1. More than 130 countries don't have a single Covid-19 vaccine, while 10 countries have already dispersed 75% of all vaccines, the UN says  CNN
  2. UN chief urges global plan to reverse unfair vaccine access  Associated Press
  3. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
More than 130 countries don't have a single Covid-19 vaccine, while 10 countries have already dispersed 75% of all vaccines, the UN says  CNN 
UN chief urges global plan to reverse unfair vaccine access  Associated Press
View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 联合国表示，130多个国家没有一种Covid-19疫苗，而10个国家已经分发了所有疫苗的75%。
聯合國表示，130多個國家沒有一種Covid-19疫苗，而10個國家已經分發了所有疫苗的75%。
